bug.author: bwindsor22
bug.summary: Out of date BERT Tutorial Link
bug.description:
Thank you for submitting a TensorFlow documentation issue. Per our GitHub policy, we only address code/doc bugs, performance issues, feature requests, and build/installation issues on GitHub. The TensorFlow docs are open source! To get involved, read the documentation contributor guide: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs>https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue: https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/distributed_training</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing): Out of date link to BERT tutorial</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Clear description</denchmark-h>
The above URL contains an out of date link: BERT Tutorial: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/official/bert/run_classifier.py>https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/official/bert/run_classifier.py</denchmark-link>
This is the correct link: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/official/nlp/bert/run_classifier.py>https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/official/nlp/bert/run_classifier.py</denchmark-link>
Are you planning to also submit a pull request to fix the issue? Yes
